title: Switch to use new Microsoft.IO.Redist (and Net Core Path library) to scan disk & handle file paths
body: The new library provides more efficient way to scan file system (with less GC pressure), and can make the globbing resolving code more efficient.

nodes.body:
Note previous failures to do this #3947. Nothing big, just may require care.

I'm also fairly concerned about compat with the existing code; we'll need to be careful about that.
